game.name: Hologuard
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Hello there! Sorry for the rush, but could you start tomorrow? Don’t worry—think of the details as “on-the-job training.” You did study the materials I gave you in advance... right?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hello there! Sorry for the rush, but could you start tomorrow? Don’t worry—think of the details as “on-the-job training.” You did study the materials I gave you in advance... right?
